row.name: UC4RB_TC_JAVA_OPTIONS#
row.xui: <text enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_TC_JAVA_OPTIONSs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" nl="1" regex="" required="0" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="Java Runtime options" tooltip="Only used, if script-mode is used and not empty. row.name: UC4RB_TC_RESTART_TOMCAT#
row.xui: <dynradiogroup enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_TC_RESTART_TOMCATs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="Restart Tomcat" tooltip="As the datasource is put into the server.xml file, the Tomcat should normally be restarted in order that changes become effective." alt="1" required="0"><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry><entry name="text">Restart Tomcat</entry><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_TC_RESTART_TOMCATs.00</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">As the datasource is put into the server.xml file, the Tomcat should normally be restarted in order that changes become effective.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/></properties></dynradiogroup>

row.name: UC4RB_TC_RES_LINKS#
